items.headline: Expedia is treating AI as a friend rather than a mortal enemy — and its stock is soaring
items.summary_en: Expedia shares climbed to a record close as the online travel agent has embraced AI to help boost business, rather than try to find ways to beat it.

items.headline: As stocks wobbled, the S&P 500 held a critical threshold. Here’s what history says happens next.
items.summary_en: The benchmark index has been above its 50-day moving average for 133 sessions, the longest streak since 2007. But that nearly came to an end on Friday.

items.headline: The shutdown is starting to ‘bite the economy,’ top Trump aide warns. The Senate is struggling to make a deal.
items.summary_en: A top economist in the Trump administration offered a fresh warning Friday about the record-setting government shutdown’s damaging effects, as the Senate struggled to make a deal to end the closure and airports began to reduce flights.
